trans-unit.source: Specifies the visual state of a scroll bar that is drawn with visual styles.
trans-unit.target: 비주얼 스타일으로 그린 스크롤 막대의 표시 상태를 지정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The ScrollBarState values correspond to the states of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> objects exposed by the following classes: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ScrollBar.LeftTrackHorizontal> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ScrollBar.RightTrackHorizontal> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ScrollBar.LowerTrackVertical> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ScrollBar.UpperTrackVertical> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ScrollBar.ThumbButtonHorizontal> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ScrollBar.ThumbButtonVertical> The ScrollBarState values are also used as an argument in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer?displayProperty=fullName> class methods that draw the scroll bar track, scroll box (also known as the thumb), and scroll box grip.
trans-unit.target: ScrollBarState 값의 상태에 해당는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement>클래스에서 제공 하는 개체:- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ScrollBar.LeftTrackHorizontal>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ScrollBar.RightTrackHorizontal>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ScrollBar.LowerTrackVertical>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ScrollBar.UpperTrackVertical>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ScrollBar.ThumbButtonHorizontal>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ScrollBar.ThumbButtonVertical>The ScrollBarState 값 중 하나에로 사용 됩니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer?displayProperty=fullName>클래스 그리기 스크롤 막대의 트랙, (라고도 thumb), 스크롤 상자 및 스크롤 상자 그립 메서드.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBarRenderer?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ScrollBar.ThumbButtonVertical> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ScrollBar.ThumbButtonHorizontal> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ScrollBar.UpperTrackVertical> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ScrollBar.LowerTrackVertical> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ScrollBar.RightTrackHorizontal> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ScrollBar.LeftTrackHorizontal> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement>

trans-unit.source: The scroll bar element is disabled.
The scroll bar element is hot.
trans-unit.target: 스크롤 막대 요소가 활성 상태로 표시 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The scroll bar element is normal.
The scroll bar element is pressed.
